com.cmput301.recipebot.ui.adapters

Class ImagePagerAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.view.PagerAdapter
      • com.cmput301.recipebot.ui.adapters.ImagePagerAdapter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EditableImagePagerAdapter

    public class ImagePagerAdapter
extends android.support.v4.view.PagerAdapter
    A PagerAdapter that shows a list of images. Each image can be a java.util.prefs.Base64 encoded String or a link to a online image. The loading is automatically done on a background thread.

    • Field Summary
